src_original: 011.006. sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/  011.007. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
tgt_original: 于時長者子悲愁離別戀父母故，廣行布施修諸福業已，往詣聖者迦多演那所，頭面頂禮白言：

src_original: 002.009. ayaṃ dārakaḥ koṭimūlyayā ratnapratyuptikayā āmuktayā jātaḥ,
tgt_original: 「此是聞星中生，復有寶耳璫珠莊嚴其耳，此寶價直俱胝。

src_original: śravaṇeṣu ca nakṣatreṣu/  002.009. bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa iti nāma/
tgt_original: 為斯事故。 孩子可名曰聞俱胝耳。

src_original: 002.010. yasminneva divase śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jātaḥ,  tasminneva divase balasenasya gṛhapaterdvau preṣyadārakau jātau/  002.011. tenaikasya dāraka iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam,
tgt_original: 」當生之日，長者家內，婢生二子，一名曰奴，二名擁護。

src_original: aparasya pālaka iti/  002.012. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
tgt_original: 長者即令乳養，置八乳母看之： 二常懷抱、二常乳食、二人洗浴、二常共遊戲作樂。

src_original: 002.015. āśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam//
tgt_original: 此八嬭母日夜供侍，常以乳酪酥及醍醐勝妙甘美飲食供給，如蓮在水，速能長大。

src_original: 002.016. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyām upanyastaḥ,  saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyām/  002.017. so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍataḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
tgt_original: 既長成已，即教學藝，先學文字算數，及知物價，別衣別木，別寶別象，別男別女，如是八種，悉皆明了。

src_original: kutaḥ karapratyāyā prajñāpitāḥ/  013.028. yadi devo 'nujānīyāt,  te vayaṃ tān karapratyāyān samucchindāmaḥ/  013.028. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ,  yanmama pitrā kṛtam,
tgt_original: 『我父先王所作之事，如釋梵天王，我今豈敢還取斯物。

src_original: devakṛtaṃ na tu brahmakṛtaṃ tat/  013.029. te saṃlakṣayanti--yadi devo 'nujānīte,
tgt_original: 』然諸臣等皆不信樂佛法，共作是念：

src_original: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā svayameva te karapratyāyā notthāsyanti/
tgt_original: 『我今當設方便，施塔之物悉還收取。

src_original: 013.030. taiḥ sa dvāre baddhvā sthāpitaḥ/  013.031. na bhūyaḥ karapratyāyā utthiṣṭhante/  013.031. tasmin stūpe caṭitakāni prādurbhūtāni/  013.032. tau jāyāpatī vṛddhībhūtau tatraiva stūpe parikarma kurvāṇau tiṣṭhataḥ/
tgt_original: 』即閉城東門，所有財物皆悉不入，其塔彩色脫落，並皆破壞。

src_original: 002.018. tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/  002.018. trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/  002.019. trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi pratyupasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhakaṃ madhyamaṃ kanīyasam/
tgt_original: 其父便為造三種堂室，謂冬、夏、秋。 復作三種園苑，三種宮殿，上、中、下別。

src_original: 013.032. uttarāpathāt sārthavāhah <14>paṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
tgt_original: 「北方有一商主，將諸商人來至此國，於塔傍住。

src_original: 014.001. tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ stūpaḥ/  014.001. caṭitasphuṭitakaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
tgt_original: 爾時商主塔所禮敬，見塔破壞，復見一女人，無有男女灑掃供養。

src_original: 014.001. sa dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati--amba tāta kasyaiṣa stūpa iti/  014.002. tau kathayatah--kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya/
tgt_original: 然彼女人，既見迦攝波如來、應、正等覺，於彼佛所發心受學。

src_original: 014.004. ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyāste 'smin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya niryātitāḥ/
tgt_original: 商主問女曰： 『此是誰塔？ 』女便廣說因緣：

src_original: 014.006. tena te karapratyāyāḥ samucchinnāḥ/  014.006. tenāsmin stūpe caṭitasphuṭitakāni prādurbhūtāni/  014.007. tasya ratnakarṇikā karṇe āmuktikā/  014.007. tena sā ratnakarṇikāvatārya tayordattā/
tgt_original: 』商主聞已，心生歡喜，即脫耳璫奉彼女人，令賣取直用修營塔：

src_original: 002.020. sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
tgt_original: 聞俱胝耳共諸婇女，往詣閣上遊戲。

src_original: 002.021. balaseno gṛhapatir nityameva kṛṣikarmānte udyuktaḥ/
tgt_original: 力軍長者，所有家事農業耕墾，皆悉自作。

src_original: 002.021. sa koṭikarṇastaṃ pitaraṃ paśyati nityaṃ kṛṣikarmānte--udyuktam/  002.022. sa kathayati--tāta,
tgt_original: 其子見父自為農業墾耕之作，告其父曰：

src_original: kasyārthe tvaṃ nityameva kṛṣikarmānte udyuktah?
tgt_original: 「云何躬自執作？

src_original: sa kathayati--putra,
tgt_original: 」長者告曰：

src_original: yathā tvamupariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍasi ramasi paricārayasi,  yadyahamapi evameva krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ paricārayeyam,  nacirādevāsmākaṃ bhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādāyaṃ gaccheyuḥ/  002.025. sa saṃlakṣayati--mamaivārthaṃ codanā kriyate/
tgt_original: 「我往亦如汝在閣上遊戲快樂，其樂不久便盡。

src_original: 002.026. sa kathayati--tāta yadyevam,  gacchāmi,
tgt_original: 」子白父言：

src_original: mahāsamudramavatarāmi/  002.026. pitā kathayati--putra tāvantaṃ me ratnajātamasti/  002.027. yadi tvaṃ tilataṇḍulakolakulatthanyāyena ratnāni parimokṣyase,
tgt_original: 「若如是者，當賜處分，我應入海採寶。 」父曰：
